Text: Thank you so much! I am very grateful for your upload. My friends and I are dedicated to supporting you!

type file/duration.

Don't mean to be unappreciative, but the video quality is poop. Full screen it looks like I'm looking through a frosted window. In this day and age, with the download speeds people have and the massive hard drives computers have, there's no reason to limit this to 500MB if it's going to look so crappy.
catflap, I suspect they compressed it differently or used a different format. The season one videos did not look this low resolution.
